narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Thomas Thurber is a Counselor, Mental Health provider based in Meriden, CT. From 2018-01 through 2020-06, this provider received $384K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2020-06, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
